      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_5ff203f13c08755bb15d00fcac93ee1757604ff6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric field lines between two parallel plates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisch fangen Sie Zeilen zwischen 
zwei parallelen Platten auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lignes de champ électrique entre deux plats 
parallèles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linhas do campo elétrico entre duas placas 
paralelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Righe del campo elettrico fra due piastre 
parallele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές ηλεκτρικών πεδίων μεταξύ δύο παράλληλων 
πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Líneas del campo eléctrico entre dos placas 
paralelas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the electric field lines between two parallel plates, one of which has a potential difference of +2 V while the other is grounded. This can be used to in an exercise that calculates the electric field strength at points A, B, C and D.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric field strength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die elektrischen
Zeilen zwischen zwei parallelen Platten auffangen, von denen 
eine einen möglichen Unterschied von +2 V hat, während die andere 
geerdet wird. Dieses kann an eine Übung innen gewöhntSEIN, die
das elektrische auffangen Stärke an Punkten A, B, C und D 
errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les lignes de champ 
électrique entre deux plats parallèles, dont un a une différence 
potentielle de +2 V tandis que l'autre est fondu. Ceci peut 
être utilisé dedans à un exercice qui calcule la force de champ 
électrique aux points A, B, C et D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as linhas do campo 
elétrico entre duas placas paralelas, um de que tem uma diferença 
potencial de +2 V quando o outro for aterrado. Isto pode ser 
usado dentro a um exercício que calcule a força do campo elétrico 
nos pontos A, B, C e D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le righe del campo 
elettrico fra due piastre parallele, uno di cui ha una differenza 
potenziale di +2 V mentre l'altro è collegato. Ciò può essere
usata dentro ad un'esercitazione che calcola la resistenza del campo 
elettrico ai punti A, B, C e D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γραμμές ηλεκτρικών 
πεδίων μεταξύ δύο παράλληλων πιάτων, ένα από τα οποία έχει 
μια πιθανή διαφορά + 2 Β ενώ άλλο στηρίζεται. Αυτό μπορεί
να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση που υπολογίζει την ισχύ 
ηλεκτρικών πεδίων στα σημεία Α, β, γ και δ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las líneas del campo 
eléctrico entre dos placas paralelas, una de las cuales tiene una 
diferencia potencial de +2 V mientras que se pone a tierra la otra. 
Esto se puede utilizar adentro a un ejercicio que calcule la 
fuerza del campo eléctrico en las puntas A, B, C y D.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spannung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie Stärke auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">möglicher Unterschied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes de champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
